tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE real_estate_ownership (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  property_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  owner_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  owner_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  transfer_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  blockchain_hash VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE RealEstateOwners (
  owner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  owner_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  owner_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE RealEstateProperties (
  property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  property_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE PropertyTransfers (
  transfer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT,
  previous_owner_id INT,
  new_owner_id INT,
  transaction_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE property_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id UUID REFERENCES properties(property_id),
    seller_id UUID REFERENCES property_owners(owner_id),
    buyer_id UUID REFERENCES property_owners(owner_id),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE property_transfers (
    transfer_id UUID primary key,
    property_address VARCHAR(100),
    previous_owner_id UUID,
    new_owner_id UUID,
    transfer_date TIMESTAMP
);
